memories.title: Wedding in Amritsar (1961)
memories.description: Walked under marigold canopy, scent of rosewater, danced to ‘Mehndi Laga Ke Rakhna’. Treasured photo in maroon lehenga beside husband.

memories.title: NHS Receptionist Job (1970s)
memories.description: Welcomed patients, translated Punjabi, remembered the weight of her name badge and first blue nurse coat.

memories.title: Sunday Chai with Daughters
memories.description: Boiled cardamom tea, BBC Asian Network played, shared silence between sips.
